Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have three blue-tinged, depressed patches on my forehead and cheeks that have been present for several months.
Have these patches changed in size or color since you first noticed them?
They slowly worsened until they stabilized at their current appearance.
Do you have any other existing medical conditions or are you currently taking any medications?
No, I don't have any other medical conditions or relevant social history.
Have you had any trauma to the areas where the patches appeared?
No, the patches appeared after I received acne treatment from a physician.
What specific treatment did you receive for your acne?
I went to a physician for acne treatment, but I didn't specify the exact type of treatment I received.
Can you specify the type of treatment you received for acne that preceded the appearance of these patches?
I'm sorry, I cannot specify the exact treatment I received for my acne.
Do you have a personal or family history of autoimmune or connective tissue diseases?
No, I do not have a personal or family history of autoimmune or connective tissue diseases.
Have you noticed any other skin changes elsewhere on your body or any other new symptoms?
No, I haven't noticed any other skin changes or new symptoms elsewhere on my body.
Final Diagnosis: Atrophoderma of Pasini and Pierini.
